backend/main.mo: Defines product, update, contact, and user role types plus storage maps, and implements admin/user access control with profile and admin‑management functions.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a minimal migration that preserves the access control state and returns it unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Guide explaining how to configure DNS and boundary node settings to use a custom domain with the Beemedha IC deployment.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, typography rules, and honeycomb background utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes using TanStack Router, including admin‑protected routes wrapped by AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Checks Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing login, loading, or access‑denied screens before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Route guard that restricts access to the contract owner, showing login or denial messages if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Shared UI primitives for sections, containers, cards, badges, and buttons with brand styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, navigation, and a newsletter subscription form.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation links, admin access check, login button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout combining header, footer, content outlet, background pattern, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card displaying a product update with type badge, date, preview text, and link to full update.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Displays product pricing with optional discount, original price, and size-based styling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Card showing product image, availability, description, price, and variant count with link to details.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Placeholder UI showing disabled purchase button and alert for upcoming checkout.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Selector for weight or flavor variants that updates selected price and variant label.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and helper to check admin ownership.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, stored identity loading, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Provides default polling and refetch settings for React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description based on page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, contact forms, and related backend data using an actor and live-update settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root stylesheet by importing the parent index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero, story, and ethical beekeeping sections, setting page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Provides UI to add or remove admin principals with validation, mutation calls, and clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows the admin dashboard with navigation cards for managing products, news, logo, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Allows admins to upload and update the site logo with file validation, preview handling, and backend upload.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Admin page for listing, creating, and deleting product news updates, with a dialog form and type‑based badges.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, filtering, and deleting products, including variant management and search/filter UI.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certification, quality assurance, and lab testing information with accompanying visuals and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with submission handling, validation, feedback alerts, and page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: A landing page with a hero section, promotional messaging, and highlight cards encouraging users to shop for honey products.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific product update, including metadata, message content, date, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed list of product updates filtered by update type, sorted by timestamp, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections covering data collection, use, sharing, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information, variant selection, pricing, availability, related updates, and navigation back to products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays product listings with category tabs, fetching products via queries and showing loading, empty, or grid states.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with structured sections and page metadata.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Utility that normalizes asset URLs by encoding only the filename portion to ensure images load correctly.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Converts backend logo binary data into browser object URLs and provides a helper to revoke them.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for formatting INR prices, determining discounts, and producing display‑ready price data.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity principals, blocking anonymous principals and offering truncation for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing plus sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin‑access issues, requirements, and current state for enabling specified principals as admins.
